title: Disconnecting from ALL games
body:
Ever since the 7.18 patch, every time I try to enter a game or even practice tool I get disconnected every 30 seconds for about 10 seconds, games are unplayable and couldn't even connect to any game earlier,
alt tab out of black screen to find it is apparently my internet connection, which i have been using the entire time with no issues, anyone available to help with this issue?

replies.body:
Hi All
Just letting you know this issue should now be resolved.
I have tested this internally myself and was able to successfully play a game without any disconnections/packet loss.
We certainly do apologise for any inconvenience this caused and if you have any further problems please do not hesitate to reach out to our Helpdesk or WebChat team on our website who can escalate this further for you. 
Thanks
Tane (Trustpower)
Thanks for coming on and letting people know the status of this issue! It's great to see you go above and beyond and reach out directly to our players!
thankyou very much :)

Hi all, at this stage we (Trustpower) are currently investigating issues with some customers playing League of Legends on the OCE Server.

We ask If you could please give our helpdesk a call (or chat with our webchat team) to let them know you are impacted - this way we can continue to investigate  further and let you know once things are resolved

Same thing here, so frustrating.
I am on trust power, could this be the problem?
what internet provider with (trust power???)
im with trustpower toois it them? my brother is playing WOW right next to me and no issues?
im with trustpower aswell and haven't been able to play for the last 3 days :(
exactly the same as me, ive called my isp already and they arent blocking any traffic. Haven't touched my router, yea... idk dude

Hi folks - thanks for posting about this.    We've done some digging and it does seem like there is some abnormal packet loss happening for players on TrustPower.

One thing you might be able to do is submit a trace route to TrustPower to help them figure out where things might be failing.

[instructions on how to perform a trace route](https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200169336-How-do-I-run-a-traceroute-)  
** Replace "yourdomain.com" with this IP address: 103.240.227.5 **

Send a copy of the trace route to TrustPower, and explain you are experiencing packet loss issues to the League of Legends Oceanic Game Servers.  You can point them to this thread too if necessary.

Cheers
Mindstar

Did what yous recommended above with the trace route, talked to trust power and looks like they have sorted it.
Cheers.

G'Day guys. 

I'm not from NZ but from Aus. And I'm also getting this issue. its caused me to get the "leaver" on my games and I've ended up not playing. This issue started yesterday (22/09) and hasn't stopped since. Its doing my head in. Ive tried everything. 

Ethernet, turning of steam (all together), leaving Discord. When no body is on the Internet it still occurs even with 35 ms (best ping i get) 

I do not have NBN (National Broadband Network) and id like to see this issue fixed. Every 10 seconds (attempting to disconnect). Then my discord and Internet crashes leaving me with "Check DNS" or "Check Internet connection" 

I'm with IPrimus which is on the Telstra network. Ive contacted them and complained months ago and still i get issues. 

Pls riot

im having the same issue aswell :(

ISP - Trustpower
lol are we all on trustpower?
looks like it lol
dl the trial on battle ping, i dont disconnect on any vpn. battle ping or otherwise
i tried it but i still get the same problem :( thanks anyway

change ur modem DNS to google and ur pc dns to google dude

8.8.8.8& 8.8.4.4

Its working for me now
Change DNS on modem and pc to google to 8.8.8.8- 8.8.4.4, fix??
So, using a Vpn seems to fix it.

Same here. Ever since 7.18 I haven't been able to play a game of league...
I am on Trust power internet.

This is happening to me too. we are using the internet fine for everything else, just wont work for lol, lets me start a game but doesnt load through.
I got through yesterday for an aram but then kept getting disconnected every 20sec or so. 
Please someone help?
